message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a chance to purchase my product for $11,500.  I believe this price reflects the value it holds for you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,800. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.
Bob, I understand your perspective on the price. How about we meet halfway and settle at $11,150?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above your halfway mark. How about we try $11,000? I think that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.
